expense_beneficiaries.name: Self
expense_beneficiaries.description: Expenses that directly benefit the user themselves.

expense_beneficiaries.name: Family
expense_beneficiaries.description: Expenses supporting immediate or extended family members.

expense_beneficiaries.name: Friends
expense_beneficiaries.description: Expenses for social connections or helping friends.

expense_beneficiaries.name: Partner
expense_beneficiaries.description: Expenses intended for a romantic partner.

expense_beneficiaries.name: Community
expense_beneficiaries.description: Expenses benefiting the wider community or society.

expense_beneficiaries.name: Work
expense_beneficiaries.description: Expenses made for work purposes or reimbursable by the employer.
